comment: If this lady Palki is reading comments.. I need to say you're awesome! Proper journalism. 💯 Anyway Hoping and praying for peace. 🙏🏻

Her voice tone has such a fine reproach when she said that “the Brits washed their hands of all responsibility, when they left Israel (1948) in a mess,  just as they left India and Pakistan after partition”
I’m from Algeria 🇩🇿 and I find this channel very informing, I think she does an excellent job as true reporter with plenty knowledge of history and culture, highly recommended 💯
Mind blowing. I can only imagine how much work was put into this 10 min video. People of today desperately need this kind of information. Thanks for your work.
Palki is the only reason I subscribed this channel
